name: Uchi (SparkyMcSparks)
description:
Fly your ship and flip polarity to travel between the floor or ceiling collecting rings to increase your score while avoiding obstacles!

Made during the 2022 Epic MegaJam in Unreal Engine 5.
The theme: "As Above, So Below"

KeyboardGamepadMove ShipWASD / Arrow KeysLeft StickRestart Game on
Death or End PathAny KeyAny KeyQuit GameEscStart Button
